DOC.HEADLINE: GLENDALE BURGLARY SUSPECT CAPTURED
DOC.TEXT: A Glendale burglary suspect was captured early Saturday after fleeing police along the Harbor Freeway , driving at speeds of more_than 100 m.p.h. , authorities said . The episode began about 3:10 a.m. with a report of a break-in at a mobile phone business in the 1300 block of East Colorado Boulevard , Glendale Police Sgt . Jim Lowrey said . Police spotted a man leaving the scene and pursued him , eventually onto the Harbor Freeway . Racing down the freeway at more_than 100 m.p.h. , the man finally exited at Century Boulevard and continued along surface streets with three Glendale and two Los Angeles police_cars in pursuit , Lowrey said . He crashed his car on 96th Street in Los Angeles and was captured after a short foot pursuit . About $ 2 # 200 worth of mobile phones were found in the car of the suspect , Frank C . Reddings , 23 , of Los Angeles , Lowrey said . Reddings was treated for unspecified arm injuries and booked into Los Angeles County Jail on a burglary charge and outstanding warrants , according to Lowrey . He will be arraigned in Glendale on Tuesday . " We had some good citizens who had witnessed this incident , " Lowrey said . " that ' s how we were able to apprehend this person. "
